amendment.description: Amendment sought to sunset the Uniformed National Consumer Protections Standards contained in the bill at the end of 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a 9 year sunset provision into the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 310, 1 Present (Roll no. 496).
